short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Liffery is an online research and wish listing tool. No noise, distractions or pressure.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Liffery is your personal research platform!

It works like this:
1 - Press the browser extension on the page you want to save
2 - (optionally) Change the channel to save to
3 - Press save and the page is saved to your LIffery account

Clean, simple and fast.

You can also....
1 - Send as a recommendation to a friend
2 - Set a reminder for the item
3 - Preview how your item will look before saving
4 - Create a new channel right in the browser extension
